text: East Beckley was an unincorporated community located in Raleigh County, West Virginia. Its post office was reopened in February 2014. East Beckley comprised parts of the unincorporated communities of Sylvia and Atkinsville. == References == * Category:Unincorporated communities in West Virginia Category:Unincorporated communities in Raleigh County, West Virginia
title: East Beckley, West Virginia
